summary: This is an email exchange within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell to Judge Alison Nathan concerning the unsealing of materials in her case. The email includes an attachment of the letter draft.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the subject of the letter being discussed, which is addressed to Judge Nathan regarding unsealing materials in her case.

persons.name: Alison Nathan
persons.context: She is the judge to whom Ghislaine Maxwell's letter regarding the unsealing of case materials is addressed.

connections.description: Maxwell is a defendant in a case over which Judge Nathan is presiding, and Maxwell is submitting a letter to the judge regarding case materials.

events.title: Maxwell's Letter to Judge Nathan
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell submits a letter to Judge Alison Nathan concerning the unsealing of materials in her criminal case.

keyFacts: On August 20, 2020, Ghislaine Maxwell submitted a letter to Judge Alison Nathan regarding the unsealing of materials in her case.
The communication is an internal email within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York discussing the letter.
The email includes an attached draft of the letter from Maxwell to Judge Nathan.
